author: Jeff Hebert
comment: Where is your weather data from? Because the temp shown is ten degrees cooler than the local temp, both on 3 other weather apps and on a digital thermometer I have. Otherwise, great work and definitely useful... Would just prefer a more accurate weather widget!

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: We get weather data from the largest weather provider OpenWeatherMap.org , and will try to add more weather provider in the future.

title: Weather is wrong?

author: Andrew Liu
comment: This is a great watch face, however; it eats up my phone battery..  23% to be precise. Not Cool!

author: Sean Porter
comment: Elegant, classy, call it what you like, but one thing's for sure - it just looks 'right'... Enough information to be useful, not too much to be in cyber-land.... It does look good. Thank you ☺️
title: Classy

author: A. P.
comment: Works well, no lag.  Elegant in it's own way. 👍

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review!

author: Lucknell Madestin
comment: It's a beautiful watch face but ambient mode does look a little off. One other issue is the digital clock is kinda tiny and gets covered by the hands which would be an issue for anyone that can't read an analog clock. Other than that this is a pretty awesome watch if you could customize it in the settings that would make it even more awesome.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Edwin Mejia
comment: I enjoy having a number of different faces and this one is simplistic and elegant. The battery life of my watch when not in use also last longer than others with ambient mode activated.
title: Very nice

author: Steve Samson
comment: Does it NEED GPS location?  Can't it use battery saving location option? Because my GPS is turned off to save battery.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi I've updated watch face, please check for the weather, I've fixed it. First time you need to refresh the weather manually and it will ask your permission to use your location. And Now it can use battery saving location options!

title: It's lovely,  but weather doesn't work

comment: Hi, change phone language from turkish to english its working.   Good watch face... Thanks...        (   hello , weather forcest widget does not work huawei watch)

comment: Uberwatch was second only to screen in battery use (phone).  Unusable for me until fixed.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi I've updated watch face, please check for the weather, I've fixed it. First time you need to refresh the weather manually and it will ask your permission to use your location. And Now it can use battery saving location options!

title: Beautiful ambient display but totally destroyed my nexus 5x battery

author: Jeffrey Beumel Jr.
comment: Fantastic Watch Face, only complaint is how small the digital watch readout is. It is pretty much blocked off most of the time between 9 and 3 twice a day.  *Feature Request* Also can we get a Purple coloring for it :D

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the feedback, yes that's possible, I think in the future updates

author: Tom Jobson
comment: I love this watch face. however it needs more customisation! for example: what the three dials show, the hand style, the 3D effect of the face (off or on), ambient mode improvements (less detail) and the ability to customise the colour to your preference rather than a few options. this face has potential, but for a paid watch face it needs the extra features.
title: customisation needed!

author: Ahmed Jan
comment: Works perfectly on the 360 and is very lite on the watch, only thing I'd like to see is some tap actions like tapping on the weather shows more details
title: Lite and beautiful

author: Carl B
comment: This is a really AIO watch face, the dev made really good usage of the DPI/resolution, at least on the Motorola 360 first gen. This watch face includes all the basic information you're expecting from a smart watch. My only suggestion would be to make the dials/widget interactive, maybe refresh the weather manually by taping it.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi I've updated watch face, please check for the weather, I've fixed it. First time you need to refresh the weather manually and it will ask your permission to use your location.

title: Great usage of DPI!

comment: This face is just great, but the weather forecast is not working!! Reason for only 3 stars instead of 5. I have clouds and "--" instead of the temperature... (Location: Europe, Brussels, so maybe this widget only works for US?)

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi I've updated watch face, please check for the weather, I've fixed it. First time you need to refresh the weather manually and it will ask your permission to use your location.

author: Andrew Barker
comment: Not a bad watch face at all. Though there should be an option to hide the 'UBER WATCH' logo on the top so it looks like a real watch.

author: paul l.
comment: Nice looking. Weather works for me. As a first offering from developer I'd say a standing triple, would be a home run with more functions as suggested in email with him.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks for the review Paul! Yeah, we are working to add more functions here with interactivity. But the main idea was to create a simple and elegant designed watch face with very essential functions for daily usage.
